name: yahoo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a rude, loud, unpleasant person, especially one who has little education
used to express excitement, pleasure, or approval : "Yahoo! I passed!" he shouted.
More examplesFewer examplesYahoo! We're off to France!Yahoo, no more school!You can come too, yahoo!We waited ages for the report. Then, yahoo, it's suddenly ready.
